title: Mr Bean [Direct Play] by Synergy
description:
Explore the hilarious world of Mr Bean and friends, as you accompany
your favourite comedy character on more exciting adventures in this
fabulous new PC game. Based on the popular series from Tiger Aspect
Productions, the hopelessly daft but delightful Mr Bean embarks on a
search for Teddy and invites you along for the ride. Side-splitting
story, simple controls, fun tasks and fabulous gameplay - join Mr Bean
and have fun like you've never known before


RiPPeD: Nothing, Nil, Nada, None
RiPPeR: Synergy
CraCKeD: RELOADED

Installation:

1. Unrar with 7z or Winrar
2. Play the game
